product_overview: Astrozen is an AI-powered product development platform that streamlines idea-to-shipped workflows by combining AI project planning, document generation, and integrated issue/project management. It unifies planning, execution, and collaboration into a single web-based workspace.
core_goals: Reduce project planning and documentation time by using AI-generated blueprints, PRDs and tickets
Provide end-to-end traceability from high-level ideas to implementation (projects -> features -> issues)
Enable fast, keyboard-first developer workflows and in-context collaboration (command palette, notifications, IDE integration)
Support real-time collaboration and visibility across teams with role-based access and project health tracking
Deliver performant, reliable UI with clear navigation and responsive data updates

features.name: Authentication
features.description: User login and registration with form validation, session management and onboarding to organization setup.
user_flows: Navigate to /login -> Fill email input field on login page -> Fill password input field on login page -> Click Login button to submit -> See /all-issues page
Navigate to /login -> Fill email input field on login page -> Fill password input field on login page -> Click Login button to submit -> See error message on invalid credentials
Navigate to /register -> Fill registration form with email, password, first name, last name -> Click Register button -> Navigate to /org-setup
Navigate to /register -> Fill registration form with email and password only -> Click Register button -> See form validation errors

features.name: Issues Management
features.description: Create, view, filter, search, update and comment on issues with activity history and CRUD operations.
user_flows: Navigate to /all-issues -> View list of all issues -> Filter issues by status (open, in_progress, done, etc.) -> Filter issues by priority (high, medium, low) -> Search issues by keyword -> Click on issue card to view details
Navigate to /all-issues -> Click create issue button to open dialog -> Fill issue details (title, description, status, priority) -> Submit issue form -> See new issue appear in list
Navigate to /all-issues -> Click on issue card to view details -> Add comments to issues -> See comment appear in activity history
Navigate to /all-issues -> Click create issue button to open dialog -> Fill issue details (title omitted) -> Submit issue form -> See form validation errors
Navigate to /all-issues -> Click create issue button to open dialog -> Fill issue details -> Submit issue form -> Network error on POST -> See error message and issue is not created

features.name: Projects Management
features.description: View and manage projects, create projects, navigate project details and manage updates and resources.
user_flows: Navigate to /projects -> View list of all projects -> Click create project button to open dialog -> Fill project details (name, description, team) -> Submit project form -> See new project listed
Navigate to /projects -> Click on project card to view details -> Navigate to /projects/:projectId -> Navigate between tabs (Features, Updates, Resources) -> Create project updates with health status
Navigate to /projects -> Click create project button to open dialog -> Fill project details with missing name -> Submit project form -> See form validation errors
Navigate to /projects -> Click on project card to view details -> Attempt to access project settings without permission -> See access denied or redirect to /projects with error notification

features.name: Features Kanban
features.description: Kanban board for managing features with drag-and-drop, milestones and linking to issues.
user_flows: Navigate to /features -> View kanban board with feature columns by status -> Click on feature to view details -> Update feature status and priority -> See feature moved to corresponding column
Navigate to /features -> Create new features -> Fill feature title and details -> Submit feature form -> See feature appear in backlog column
Navigate to /features -> View kanban board -> Drag and drop features between status columns -> Release DnD action triggers PATCH -> See updated status persisted
Navigate to /features -> Start drag and drop -> Network failure during PATCH -> See error notification and feature returns to original column

features.name: AI Generator (AI Project Planning & Documentation)
features.description: AI-powered idea submission, validation, blueprint and document generation (PRD, blueprints, tickets, suggestions).
user_flows: Navigate to /ai-generator -> Submit new idea with name and description -> Get AI suggestions -> Generate blueprint from idea -> See generated blueprint and recommended features

Navigate to /ai-generator -> Submit new idea with name and description -> Answer validation questions -> Get AI suggestions -> Generate project documents (PRD, App Flow) -> See documents available for editing
Navigate to /ai-generator -> Upload documents for analysis -> Sync blueprint from docs -> Generate project documents -> See linked blueprint and generated artifacts
Navigate to /ai-generator -> Submit new idea -> AI service times out or returns error -> See error message and option to retry or submit clarifying input

features.name: Navigation & Global UI
features.description: Sidebar, header and command palette for keyboard-first navigation, notifications and quick actions.
user_flows: Navigate to / -> See redirect to /all-issues -> Click sidebar menu item 'Inbox' -> Navigate to /inbox -> View inbox issues page
Navigate to / -> Use command palette (Ctrl+K) -> Type 'Go to Projects' -> Press Enter -> Navigate to /projects -> See active page indicator on Sidebar
Navigate to /any-protected-route while unauthenticated -> Click sidebar link -> Redirect to /login -> See login page
Navigate to / -> Toggle user menu dropdown -> Click logout button -> See redirect to /login

features.name: Settings
features.description: User profile and organization settings with profile updates and team management.
user_flows: Navigate to /settings -> Navigate between settings tabs (Profile, Organization) -> Update user profile (name, email) -> Submit changes -> See success confirmation and updated profile data
Navigate to /settings -> View organization details -> Click manage team -> Navigate to /teams/:teamId/settings -> Update team settings -> Save -> See saved confirmation
Navigate to /settings -> Update user email with invalid format -> Submit changes -> See form validation error
